CTA.title: Contact Us
CTA.subtitle: Founded in 2013, Oukra is a leading importer and exporter of cutting-edge air conditioning and refrigeration systems. We obtained our commercial trademark rights in 2015 , solidifying our commitment to *(quality, reliability, and innovation).

About.title: We Present Technology as an Art
About.subtitle: About us:
About.subtitle1: Shenzhen UKKO Electronic Co., Ltd. specializes in the research and development, manufacturing, and export trade of electrical components, acrylic panels, and other related products worldwide.
About.subtitle2: FOur team of skilled professionals is committed to continuously improving ourselves and expanding our market reach since our establishment.
About.subtitle3: We prioritize establishing a robust internal quality assurance system and obtaining quality certifications to ensure our customers receive top-notch products. We have forged strong trade partnerships with numerous clients over time.

Footer.subtitle: Through our own R&D, we are dedicated to manufacturing acrylic frames, connectors, copper components and PCBa, etc. to export in the whole world.
Footer.address1: Room 309, Building 4, Liantang Industry Park, 48 Kangzheng Road, Longgang District, Shenzhen, China

Hero.subtitle: we are aiming to be one of the journeys of making the product from A to Z

Services.title3: We aim to provide a product journey from the ground up.

item1.name: User-Centric Design
item1.content: We prioritize user-centric design, ensuring user needs and preferences dictate our design process. This approach involves understanding user requirements, robust research, and continuous feedback integration, leading to products that are both functional and optimized for user experience.

item2.name: Development of Customer Products
item2.content: UKKO-CO is dedicated to creating outstanding products, a commitment that originates from their state-of-the-art laboratories. Their expert team conducts rigorous evaluations of existing products, pinpointing their strengths and areas of improvement.

item3.name: Offer Free Samples for Trial
item3.content: We embody unparalleled excellence in every product we create. Rather than just highlighting their quality, we emphasize hands-on experience by offering free samples to potential customers, giving a tangible taste of our superior standards across diverse products like skincare and dietary supplements.

CatalogSection.title: TOP CATALOGS
CatalogSection.description: We prioritize quality to provide you with exceptional products that stand the test of time.
